price: Kuma kõwane ɓangare yana da alƙibla wadda yake shi mai fuskantar ta ne. Sai ku yi tsẽre zuwa ga ayyukan alhẽri, inda kuka kasance duka Allah zai zo da ku gabã ɗaya. Lalle ne Allah, a kan kõme, Mai ĩkon yi ne.
arabic: وَلِكُلّٖ وِجۡهَةٌ هُوَ مُوَلِّيهَاۖ فَٱسۡتَبِقُواْ ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ أَيۡنَ مَا تَكُونُواْ يَأۡتِ بِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walikullin wij'hatun huwa muwallīhā fa-is'tabiqū al-khayrāti ayna mā takūnū yati bikumu al-lahu jamīʿan inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
